title: Ocean Week Q&A!
body:
Hey guys,

If you have any questions about Ocean Week feel free to ask below! We are really excited to see how fast you guys reach the top goal!



Updates below:

**My Contribution** Section:
Summoners we're aware of the delay to your contribution updating. We're working on the issue but rest assured what's displayed here is separate to the database tracking rewards. As long as you win your 3 games and we hit goal you'll have your name on the reef statue!

~~~~
Mystery Gift bonus is LIVE
(WOW you guys are smashing it!)

~~~~
Fizz Icon has been unlocked! it will be available next patch

replies.body:
How big is the statue?

Like can you provide it's stats or image?

Ty.
The statue is going to be chosen by the community then designed, so we don't know yet. But when we do we will definitely let you guys know.

Finally an event that's only for OCE.

I feel special in this server now...

Hi Riot Maraudur

Just a small question, is this statue going to placed in New Zealand or Australia and could that change?
There is a lengthy approvals process involved for an underwater reef site, when it's 100% confirmed we'll announce the location.
I think it should be Australia, seeing the GBR is there, and Australia's known for it's aquatic wildlife, although, it would depend on what they have in mind also.
Probably safer in NZ so it doesn't get eaten by kangaroo-spidersharks

Near the great barrier reef would be a good place as it would send a message about conservation, which is something our politicians need to be reminded of. It's also a tourist hotspot, so it would be a great place to promote LoL.
Down south all the way (VIC), kinda hard to promote League if it's sunk where only people who know about it in the first place can check it out.
I don't see the Ocean week champs as my free ones, Will it be changed soon or do I have to play {{champion:89}} only til I can afford ones I want to play?

> [{quoted}](name=shintoshiva,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VgkpTJp8,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-01-24T17:28:29.147+0000)
>
> I don't see the Ocean week champs as my free ones, Will it be changed soon or do I have to play {{champion:89}} only til I can afford ones I want to play?

I have the same problem! I only get Ashe, Brand, Darius, etc. as free, no Oceanic champs :/

It's coming up for me! it should have been like this all week. Send a screen shot of what it looks like for you?

http://puu.sh/eZ5zn/afd2e82d6c.jpg
They are under level 6 so they get the under level 6 rotation.

Is this exclusive to the Oceanic servers? (I'd understand if you wanted to get everyone involved with the event, and spread the Australia Day and Waitangi Day culture worldwide)

Do you plan on doing any events similar to this in the future for other celebrations? (If so, do you plan on extending the points bar and/or adding more rewards?)

This event is exclusive to Oceania! We really wanted to deliver a cool experience for players in the region.

Mmm events like Ocean Week are definitely cool, but in my opinion they have much more value when done very rarely. At this point there are no plans for another event like this.

If we achieve the three points after the goal is reached will we still get our name on the statue?

Are the Riot offices in other regions jealous?

You have to get 3 points **before** the goal is hit! 

Other offices are pretty jealous right now =P

this is just so sad - the goal was hit with 2 days, that means heaps of us would have missed out. if the goal was environmental awareness, wouldn't it be better to include more names? 
i just thought that excluding people without any good reason (it's not like this is some kind of competition) is not very cool...
 T.T
Damn only just read that ranked games don't count as points... woulda been so good to get President Obama written on the statue ;_;
Aww i was so busy on the weekend, finally get back to normal to play some LoL and participate in this awesome event and its already too late :(

I've switched to the Oceanic servers, seeing it was free from NA, but when I realized that it was too late, and that there wasn't really any more of a reason to continue playing on it, I tried to switch back to NA but saw it was 2600. Could I get some help going back to NA? I don't really understand why the transfer over was free, but the return over was not. If I could get a response, I'd appreciate it.

(I'm sorry if this isn't the place to ask, but I'm desperate about it now. I can't afford a switch back to NA, and I thought it would be free to switch back.)
why cant i buy myself mysytery skins (only gift) i bught 50$ rp thinking i could  buy for myself...

@ riotmaraudeur

Why the fizz's icon is not avalaible on others servers like you said ?
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsCtT4Nj46BEULhY1_lEkNw

hey guys check out my channel i do live commentarys hope you enjoy  my youtube name is          TripleDDose
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsCtT4Nj46BEULhY1_lEkNw


all support appriciated :)))   i upload on a regular basis
How come the Ocean Week Fizz summoner icon isn't in the store yet? It said that in the next patch it would be on sale for 1 IP for the next 2 weeks
If you havent gotten 3 points yet for your name on the statue can you keep earning them now or is it over ?
so is there going to be a double chance on the mystery gifts?
It's been live for a few days! It will go till February 8th

Hi,
I posted an entry to the 2D art contest via facebook a few minutes ago - but FB only had an option to enter the diorama contest, so I had to enter it under that option. It's not yet 3pm - can you please make sure you check the diorama entries for 2D entries? I am not the only person having this problem!
Will make sure it goes through!
Awesome, thank you!
will the statue be colour or will it be like bronze coloured..?

This is so cool and a great idea, I'm sure the fishies will love it.

I was just thinking about the design though. If it's {{champion:111}} will he be laying down or upright? Upright could work if the statue isn't that big or if it was super big and the inside was hollow, but it would IMO be more suitable if he was laying down kind of "fallen". His insides could still be hollow and you could make him as big as you want, his anchor could also be important. {{champion:267}} would be really good upon further thought, her body's long and slim so you could make her big and she'd cover a nice chunk of ground.

Also who's idea was all of this? It really is a great idea.
What exactly was the inspiration into doing Ocean Week?

Hi:
From the description of ocean week i read:
"If you contribute at least three points before this goal is reached your Summoner Name will be recorded on the statue.achieved."

if i was a little late, and got the 3 points after the gold is reached, but before the ocean week ends, does it mean i won't have my name on the statue?

kinda disappointed though, thought i still had a few days for it.

Quick question, if someone hasn't contributed any points, can they still mystery gift with the double chance? Or do they need to get a point first before it applies to them?
The double chance is in effect for everyone on Oceania through February 8.
Just wondering why i didnt get a Ocean week point for winning a game on Twisted Treeline as Graves, it wasnt custom game either. little confused.

There was an issue with Twisted Treeline points when it first came up on the Saturday. Is that when you played?

CptStupendous has more information about it in this thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/1qWfrvNY-ocean-week-challenge-event-twisted-treeline?comment=000200000000000100000000
Quick question, will the rotation we were having be resumed after the ocean week finishes? I haven't played enough Azir yet...

When the Ocean Week free-rotation switches over, it will go to the same place it would be at that time. 

So it won't 'resume' to where it was before Ocean Week, it will rejoin the normal rotation where it should be on that day.

Looks like oceanic unlocked the reef in just over 2 days.
I wonder if riot thought it would be a challenge for us or not{{champion:105}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}}
What do we have to do to be able to get all of the rewards?
Is the mystery gift upgrade in affect yet?
It is in affect! gift away! {{champion:201}}
